abstract: By gaining more than 450 books from Marshall Cavendish Children’s Books for an undisclosed sum, Amazon is beginning its first significant push into the category. Amazon says it plans to convert all of the titles into e-books.
snippet: By gaining more than 450 books from Marshall Cavendish Children’s Books for an undisclosed sum, Amazon is beginning its first significant push into the category. Amazon says it plans to convert all of the titles into e-books.
lead_paragraph: Amazon expanded its publishing ambitions on Tuesday by acquiring more than 450 titles from Marshall Cavendish Children’s Books, a niche publisher.
